brand: AJ Dezines Kids Beige & Pink Kurta Pyjama Waistcoat Set for Boys
decription:
AJ Dezines present this pink colored latest side cut kurta pyjama in kids collection with a sleeveless waistcoat.This product is made up of raw silk blend fabric which makes it more comfortable for your child. There?s no risk of shading, stretching and stitching issue as we use high quality raw material for all of our products. Wasitcoat have nehru collar, welt pocket, pocket square, button detailing and embroidred with embroidery work.Pyjmas have elastic which ensures it fits to the little and delicate waist of your child. This ethnic wear is suitable for all parties, wedding, traditional Indian festivals like Diwali, Navratri, Dussehra, Pongal, Onam, Lohri, Eid, Christmas and so on. This product comes with kurta , pyjama and waistcoat. You can team it up with matching footwear For a complete traditional look. We are a leading Brand in kids wear with wide range of kids clothing which includes kids ethnic wear, casual wear, accessories and a lot more.
Regular Fit

brand: Aj DEZInES Boys Black & Gold-Toned Sherwani Set
decription:
AJ Dezines presents this black coloured party wear boys dress set. Fashion style with super fine silk blend fabric and crafted with brooch and fancy button work that feel your boy all day comfortable. This kids clothes set comprises of a full sleeve kurta, a waistcoat and pair of pyjama. Featuring nehru collar, button detailing, solid pattern, pocket square, curved hem, eye catching design and these kids cloths are light in weight and presented to patrons in different sizes. You can club it with a pair of mojari for perfect traditional look. Suitable for party, wedding, ceremony, any occasion festival like Diwali, Navratri, Dussehra, Pongal, Onam, Lohri, Eid, Christmas and so on. We are a leading Brand in kids wear with wide range of kids clothing which includes kids ethnic wear, accessories and a lot more.
Regular Fit
This sherwani set from Aj DEZInES is a must-have in your little boy's ethnic wardrobe. It can be teamed with a pair of sandals or mojaris for a typical ethnic look.
